title: INVESTMENT part 1
description: Learn how to protect your capital and maximize your trading career longevity through proper risk management.
content:
In this course:

• Calculate proper position sizes
• Understand win rates vs risk-reward ratios
• Learn the Kelly Criterion
• Implement proper stop losses
• Build a risk management plan for your account

quiz.question: What does a 1:3 risk-reward ratio mean?
options: You win 3 times for every 1 loss
Your account grows 3 times per trade
quiz.explanation: A 1:3 risk-reward ratio means for every $1 you risk, you're aiming to make $3 in profit. This is favorable for long-term trading profitability.
